mosparams.description: Database Query is a Mambo query manager.

param.name: ACCESS_LEVEL
param.label: Access Level of User
param.description: The access level required to view this field. This is a feature of DBQ Professional.

param.name: HIDE_FIELD
param.label: Hide Field
param.description: Hide the field in the display. This is useful if you want to retrieve and use data but not actually show it. This is a feature of DBQ Professional.

param.name: @spacer
param.label: Next Query
param.description: The Next Query feature enables linking between one form to another using field vairalbes. This is a feature of DBQ Professional.

param.name: NEXT_QUERY_ENABLE
param.label: Enable Next Query
param.description: Enable a link to the next query, if enabled on the query. This is a feature of DBQ Professional.

param.name: NEXT_QUERY_ID
param.label: Next Query ID
param.description: Query ID for the next query. This is a feature of DBQ Professional.

param.name: NEXT_QUERY_TEXT
param.label: Next Query Text
param.description: Description tag for the link to the next query. This is a feature of DBQ Professional.

param.name: NEXT_QUERY_TASK
param.label: Next Query Task
param.description: Toggle the task to be performed by the next query. This is a feature of DBQ Professional.

param.name: NEXT_QUERY_UNIQUE_WINDOW
param.label: Unique Window
param.description: If enabled, a new window will always be created.

param.name: NEXT_QUERY_TARGET_VARIABLE
param.label: Next Query Target Variable
param.description: Name of the variable to which the current field will be passed. This is a feature of DBQ Professional.

param.name: NEXT_QUERY_CONFIRMATION_MESSAGE
param.label: Confirmation Message
param.description: A message that will appear within a confirmation dialog box.

param.name: NEXT_QUERY_TARGET_WINDOW
param.label: Target Window
param.description: The name of the target window, blank if you want the next query to appear in the current window. This is a feature of DBQ Professional.

param.name: NEXT_QUERY_TARGET_JAVASCRIPT
param.label: Target Window Javascript
param.description: This is a feature of DBQ Professional.

param.name: @spacer
param.label: Grid Display
param.description: When query results are displayed as a grid, a field can offer special functionality to sort, constrain, and hide the data. This is a feature of DBQ Professional.

param.name: DATA_TYPE
param.label: Data Type
param.description: The type of data that the field represents.

param.name: ZP_GRID_FILTER_TYPE
param.label: Grid Filtering
param.description: Enable filtering of the column data when using a grid to present data.
